name: Kestrel / OpenC2 hunting playbook. Implements the equivalent of the Jupyter notebook for the April 2024 plugfest; see:
description:
Kestrel / OpenC2 hunt playbook for the April 2024 CASP Village plugfest; implements the equivalent of the Jupyter notebook posted by Kestrel. See:
 https://github.com/opencybersecurityalliance/casp/blob/main/Plugfests/2024-03-NorthernVirginia/SweatEquity/IBM/complete_hunt.ipynb
